Articles.Content:
when i made a new RSS install i tried to test a vessel so i got it to orbit then i de-orbited but when the reentry effect start it just show pink stuff i don't know why i can't see any fire ? KSP .90 i can post the mods i have installed if you guys want

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited December 23, 2014 by Abdu

Are you using 64bit KSP? I saw exactly that same thing when I tried the 64bit "hack" that came out before official 64bit release. Though in that case idk how you could have gotten RealChutes working. Also, are you using DX11/OpenGL? When I used the said hack, then this problem was triggered by me trying to use OpenGL or DX11, don't remember exactly.

Edited December 23, 2014 by xrayfishx

I'm not using 64bit, and yes i'm using OpenGL but this is not my first time using it and nothing wrong ever happened

and RealChute works fine in .90
In .90, DX11 and OpenGL mess up KSP's shaders.

In .90, DX11 and OpenGL mess up KSP's shaders.

is that just in RSS or normal KSP, OpenGL works fine in normal .90 KSP
any fix ? or should i just play without OpenGL ?
